name: 蘇昭瑾
objective:
本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有
(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。　　Surface science and chemistry play important roles in many real processes: they are intimately involved in heterogeneous catalysis, in thin film production, in semiconductor devices fabrication, and in nano-technology. Over the past half century, chemists and physicists have developed elaborate instrumentation to elucidate the arrangement of the atoms on the surface, the surface composition, and the surfaces reactivity, which all impact significantly in many aspect of high-tech. related science. Therefore, I have design this course to elucidate the gas-solid interfacial phenomena, principles and techniques of surface science and its application to meet the increasing demand for analysis of solid surfaces in both the “academic” and “technological” fields.
